929190.name: RPG Maker MV - The Adventurer's Journey
929190.description:
Grab your sword, staff or bow and add a unique twist to your adventures!

The Adventurer's Journey Music Pack features 20 orchestrated tracks from D. C. Kairi Sawler that is sure to give your games a unique adventurous feel.

This pack contains:

  • 20 Orchestrated Tracks
  • OGG and M4A file formats for RPG Maker MV
  • The MP3 version of the tracks are included as a bonus
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects

Tracklist:

Angel's Breath
Broken
Calming Dungeons
Chillcave
Crying River
Darkened Winds
Forrent
Gearworks
Giant's Hill
Grassland Adventure
Grassland Minor
Night on the Sand
Pacing Mind
River Petals
Shadows All Around
Shimmerlight Skies
Silver Sunrise
Sleepless Stars
Sorrowake
Swaysea Coast
Twinklerock Cave
Ursulian March
Warring Swords

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
929190.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
